thread.title: Bella Hadid supports sister Gigi at Tommyland show in LA | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid supports sister Gigi at Tommyland show in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.Com
title: Bella Hadid supports sister Gigi at Tommyland show in LA | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 289 shares She wore a dainty, white dress featuring eyelets and corset detail topped off with a jacket in Tommy Hilfiger's signature colors of navy and yellow. With combat boots on foot and conductor hat atop her head, Bella was poised for all the action to take Wednesday evening. TommyxGigi: The 20-year-old left New York for the west coast to support her fellow supermodel sister, Gigi Hadid, 21, who has entered into a partnership with the fashion house She got there first: Gigi posed wit Tommy Hilfiger at the big bash Before heading out from New York on Tuesday, Bella shared a gif to her Instagram account from a luxurious setup on an airplane fully of Tommyland models as she started a cross-country journey to Los Angeles. 'So excited to see my sister @gigihadid 's new @tommyxgigi collection tomorrow in LA ' she wrote with the clip, also featuring her friend and fellow fashion model, Joan Smalls. 'So proud!!!!' Hilfiger's music festival-inspired event on Venice Beach is his first-ever show outside New York. California bound: Bella shared a gif to her Instagram account on Tuesday, from a luxurious setup on an airplane as she started a cross-country journey to Los Angeles Tommyland will feature amusement rides, local food trucks, graffiti artists, rollerskaters, acrobats, fire-throwers and two surprise musical performances. The ambitious event — which is set to rival Victoria’s Secret’s annual runway show in terms of wow factor — highlight's fashion’s reach as a media and entertainment platform. Guests will be again able to shop the collection immediately after the show at concert merchandise-style pop-ups on site, and both online and at stores across the country the very nexy day. The show kicks off on Wednesday at 5.00pm Pacific and everyone is invited to enjoy the spectacle via live stream at the Tommy Hilfiger website . Where to watch: The show kicks off on Wednesday at 5.00pm Pacific and everyone is invited to enjoy the spectacle via live stream at the Tommy Hilfiger website Read more: Share or comment on this article 289
